content.rendered:
Thanksgiving Hours

 

FREE $10 Gift Card

Get a FREE $10 gift card with every $25 gift card you buy! Offer good from November 25th through December 24th. Limit 10 free gift cards per customer. Gift cards must be redeemed after December 25th.

 

Small Business Saturday

Support your local businesses by “shopping small” on Small Business Saturday on November 26th!

 

New Books

Did you know that Gottwals Books has a new book section? Check it out for new releases or popular titles.

 

Toys and Gifts

Gottwals Books carries high quality pretend play toys and educational products… perfect for holiday gifts!
